text: John Coleman (October 15, 1934 - January 20, 2018) is an American TV weatherman and co-founder of The Weather Channel. He retired from broadcasting after nearly 61 years, working the last twenty at KUSI-TV in San Diego. Coleman died in Las Vegas, Nevada on January 20, 2018 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American television presenters Category:Journalists from Texas Category:The Weather Channel
title: John Coleman (meteorologist)
